alert.note: Alert for Garland; Perry; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:40PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Perry, north central Garland and northwestern Saline Counties through 315 PM CST... At 240 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jessieville, or 10 miles northwest of Hot Springs Village, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Perryville... Adona... Jessieville... Williams Junction... Wye Mountain... Aplin... Antioch in Perry County... Oak Grove in Perry County... Long Mountain... Thornburg... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Cherry Hill in Perry County... Deberrie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central Arkansas.
